definitions.definition: Also used with the impersonal pronoun it ( dated ) : to shirk or wander from business or duty ; ( specifically ) of a student : to be absent from school without permission ; to play truant .
examples: The number of schoolchildren known to have truanted from this school has been unusually high.

definitions.definition: To idle away or waste ( time ).

main_definition: ( intransitive ) Also used with the impersonal pronoun it ( dated ) : to shirk or wander from business or duty ; ( specifically ) of a student : to be absent from school without permission ; to play truant .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive , obsolete ) To idle away or waste ( time ).
